# fetchLastDisconnectError(completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Retrives the most recent error that caused the VPN to disconnect.

## Declaration

```swift
func fetchLastDisconnectError(completionHandler handler: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func fetchLastDisconnectError() async throws
```

## Parameters

- **handler**: An error handler that receives the last disconnect error as a parameter.

## Discussion

If VPN system (including the IPsec client) generated the error, then the error uses the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNConnectionErrorDomain] error domain. If the error came from a tunnel provider app extension instead, then the error is the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSError] that the provider passed when disconnecting the tunnel.

## Handling errors

- **NEVPNConnectionErrorDomain**: The domain for errors resulting from VPN connection calls.
- **NEVPNConnectionError**: Error codes specific to VPN connections.
